Hi Shannon 

-When the shoguns were in power the Emperors were still around=
. The Japanese Imperial family is the longest unbroken line of rulers in hi=
story.
-Training and weapons......complex subject depends on the region, ti=
me period individual preference etc you could write a book on the one subje=
ct alone.
-Diamyo........ Yes they were the lords of the samurai, but they =
WERE samurai, like a modern day general, who leads soldiers but is also a s=
oldier himself and commands and fights along side of them. Also he was the =
head of the clan and ruler of a region, a province or several provinces, th=
at may or may not be fully autonomous and therefore had authority over EVER=
YTHING that went on in his lands.

Hope this helps it is a very complex sub=
ject and this is only the short answer.
Dave
